document.full_text: european central bank policymaker ewald nowotny on tuesday favored giving greece more time to repay its financial aid rather than issuing new loans, and he and another ecb official ruled out a debt restructuring.
document.title: ecb's nowotny backs longer greek aid repayment
lines_and_colors: european central bank policymaker ewald nowotny on tuesday favored giving greece more time to repay its financial aid rather than issuing new loans, and he and another ecb official ruled out a debt restructuring.
